channel.title: SFoL 45: Return of the Blue Dragon III - Day 2 - An Interesting Awakening
channel.description:
# [[NEW THREAD]](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-45-5-rotbd-iii-here-we-go-again-confirmation/75084/)
## Welcome to RotBD 45. The first not Xed SFoL hosted by Pug and cohosted by @Insanity
### [Classcards (please read as there have been quite a few changes)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-rotbd-rework-by-an-idiot-who-makes-unbalanced-gamemodes/66438)
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 days/72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 day/24 hours long Actions are done by messaging me The Blue Dragon will speak through a PM The Dead and the Soulcatcher will speak through a PM [Neutral Class Cards Thread. Only changes are Fanatic is now Solider, Spiteful King is now Conservative King and Warlock's retheme is in the RotBD Classcards](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998/6) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial. Everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent in the thread. At any time in the trial phase. The King may use decide fate, If majority is reached on execute. The player will be killed and the day will end. If pardon is reached on the execution Executions end the Day #### I really badly did want to remove trials but Marl felt like I shouldn't have due to it being too much.
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **[color=purple]Corrupted King - 65%[/color] / [color=steblue]Righteous King - 35%[/color]** **[color=steblue]Negotiator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Insurgent[/color]** **[color=purple]Kidnapper[/color]** **[color=purple]Marshal[/color]** **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** **[color=purple]Unseen Investigator[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] / [color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] / [color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]**
### Players: 1. **Soulshade** :crown: 1. **techwolves** 2. **WazzaAzza** 3. **bazinga** 4. **Hjasik** 5. **Maxi** 6. **Luxy** 8. **PKR** 9. **Margaret** 10. Geyde 11. **Squid** 12. **Frostwolf** 14. **Solic** 15. **Alice** 16. **Marl**
### Graveyard: **Sam17z - [color=steblue]The Negotiator[/color] - Died Night 1** **PoisonedSquid - [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] - Died Night 1**
### Backups: Geyde
### Spectators: Twi Poke Meteoro Isaac
### Timestamps: [Day 2 - An Interesting Awakening](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-45-return-of-the-blue-dragon-iii-night-1/75000/235?u=pug)

item.title: SFoL 45: Return of the Blue Dragon III - Day 2 - An Interesting Awakening
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
New changes.

Negotiator:

  • Undercover Rebel (Passive) - You will appear to be a member of the Unseen to investigators for the first three nights. Additionally if you die at any time, the youngest non killing Blue Dragon member will become the new Negotiator. If there is no non Killing Blue Dragons, it will instead be the Youngest Blue Dragon Killer.

Kidnapper:

  • Cannot use Execute until Night 2. This is not specified on Prince because it’s impossible to have a Prince before Night 2

Alchemist:

  • Renamed Evils’ Tar Potion to Concrete Potion
  • Specified uses for said Concrete Potion as 3 uses

OP.

  • Will now specify Blue Dragon’s factioncap. Which is 4.

Read full topic
